message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Alice, $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to offer you $10500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $13500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit higher than my budget. How about $12000? I'm really interested in this product and I think this price is fair for both of us.
I'm glad you're interested in the product, Bob! I can do $13000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
